#summary jQuery Widget with Core Framrwork

= Widget =
Core Framework allows you to easily create jQuery widgets
{{{
Core.jQuery.widget('ui.observer',
{
	options:
	{
		version: 1.0
	},
	observe: function()
	{
		this.element.data('Timestamp', new Date().getTime());
	},
	_create: function()
	{
		/* Bind simple click listener */
		this.element.bind('click',this.delegate(this, this.observe))
	}
});
}}}
